resources.string:
Hey Timz

 Of course, while there is no one-size-fits-all template 
 for a professional bio, 
 this template is a quick way to start building

 out your long or short bio before customizing it to your 
 liking. But before choosing your 
 bio template,there are some key elements to include to make
